_header: Alas for sins that I have wrought
_description: A sinner’s lament — two couplets in John Grimestone’s sermon book following ‘Quilibet peccator potest dicere Amen’

NLS18721.Transcription:
A Allas for sennes þat I haue wrouthM Merci iesu Pat hast me
                    bouthE Elp iesu an saue þu meN Nede maket me criȝen to
                    þe
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 32.
